meaningMnemonic: The <radical>leader</radical> <radical>samurai</radical> didn't become leader by sitting around not taking action. He got to where he is by <kanji>doing</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: He was <kanji>doing</kanji> things with <reading>shee</reading>p (し). He is the leader of the sheep clan, and he was able to do more with sheep than anyone else. That's why he's the leader.
